Introduction

Kim Dong Yun is a South Korean singer under Woollim Entertainment. He made his official debut on October 28, 2020, as a member of the boy group DRIPPIN.

When he was a trainee, Dongyun participated in the hit reality show Produce X 101 where he finished 23rd place.
